description: This is a FastAPI router module defining authentication endpoints for user registration and login, handling OAuth2 password-based authentication, token issuing, and error handling.

methods.name: register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to register a new user and return an access token.

methods.name: login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to authenticate a user and obtain an access token.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(form_data: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^def register(form: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(), db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/
